wands.name: Frost Wand
wands.lore: Carved from ancient Ice Elf roots, it hums with frost.

wands.name: Tinsel Twister
wands.lore: A wand wrapped in enchanted tinsel, capable of launching harmless but dazzling distractions.

wands.name: Peppermint Rod
wands.lore: Carved from solidified peppermint oil. Emits gusts of invigorating, frosty air.

wands.name: Gingerbread Stick
wands.lore: A fragile-looking wand that smells of spices. It can summon minor gingerbread minions.

wands.name: Frost Wand
wands.lore: Carved from ancient Ice Elf roots, it hums with frost.

wands.name: Blizzard Spire
wands.lore: A masterfully crafted spire that can conjure powerful, localized blizzards.

wands.name: Wind-up Key
wands.lore: A giant, enchanted wind-up key that manipulates time around enemies.

wands.name: Blink Rod
wands.lore: A Toykin rod that allows the caster to teleport short distances.
